org.apache.beam.sdk.util.state

Interface MergingStateAccessor<K,W extends BoundedWindow>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    StateAccessor<K>

    @Experimental(value=STATE)
public interface MergingStateAccessor<K,W extends BoundedWindow>
extends StateAccessor<K>
    Interface for accessing persistent state while windows are merging.

    For internal use only.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <StateT extends State>
      Map<W,StateT>      		 accessInEachMergingWindow(StateTag<? super K,StateT> address)
      Analogous to StateAccessor.access(org.apache.beam.sdk.util.state.StateTag<? super K, StateT>), but returned as a map from each window which is about to be merged to the corresponding state.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.beam.sdk.util.state.StateAccessor

        access

    • Method Detail

      • accessInEachMergingWindow

        <StateT extends State> Map<W,StateT> accessInEachMergingWindow(StateTag<? super K,StateT> address)
        Analogous to StateAccessor.access(org.apache.beam.sdk.util.state.StateTag<? super K, StateT>), but returned as a map from each window which is about to be merged to the corresponding state. Only includes windows which are known to have state.
